item.title: Last March I saw the fun word "lambe-lambe" used to describe a poster campaign. Thus began a quest to learn why "reduplication" (words like "corre-corre" and "pula-pula") is so common in Brazil. Along the way, I discovered "lepo-lepo." For @TheEconomist ðŸ§µhttps://t.co/iQYxFnTjR2
